General.Name: Enovix Corp
General.Description: Enovix Corporation designs, develops, and manufactures lithium-ion battery cells in the United States and internationally. It serves wearables and IoT, smartphone, computing, electrical vehicles, and original equipment manufacturers. The company was founded in 2007 and is headquartered in Fremont, California.
General.Address: 3501 West Warren Avenue, Fremont, CA, United States, 94538
